WorkItem.Description:
Issue: Sub-region(s) defined inside a view do not get removed from RegionManager when the view get removed.
Â 
Expected: When the view defining sub-region(s) get removed from it's region, the region(s) defined in the view getting removed should to be removed from the region manager.
WorkItem.Summary: Sub-region(s) defined inside a view do not get removed from RegionManager when the view get removed.
